item.title: About
item.description:
I’m Yevhen Krasnokutsky, an experienced AI Team Leader and ML Engineer.

My work is centered on developing robust solutions using a variety of technologies, including Python, C++, and PyTorch. I have extensive experience with MLOps and have built a strong command of tools like Kubeflow, MLFlow, MinIO, Airflow, Triton, KServe, and Ray.

I have a particular interest in computer vision and cloud technologies. In my free time, I enjoy exploring niche technologies and programming languages outside of the ML and MLOps space.
